val:
I prototyped and developed the front-end of many of web systems of Genomika. Some of them was the partner system, which, initially, only partners could solicitate tests for patients. This system was integrated to website to end-users could see the catalogue of exams.

When the covid19 pandemic starts, we adjusted this systems for all clients can purchase covid19 tests by a link from landing page in the website. The requirements changed as fast as possible, provided by the pandemic context. For example, in the first time the user only could schedule a exam for covid in a drive-through, in a second momento it didn't more necessary.

Another adaptation from partner websystem was a negociation module which the partner

genomas raros / Cesar Summer Jobs

sell

A minimal, dark blue theme for VS Code, Sublime Text, Atom, iTerm, and more. Available on Visual Studio Marketplace, Package Control, Atom Package Manager, and npm.
